T=input()
list=[]
for i in range(T):
    M=input()
    for j in range(2):
        l=map(int,raw_input().split())
        l.sort()
        list.append(l)
for j in range(0,2*T-1,2):
    count=0
    for k in range(len(list[j])):
        for t in range(len(list[j+1])):
            if list[j][k]<=list[j+1][t]:
                list[j+1].remove(list[j+1][t])
                break
    print len(list[j])-len(list[j+1])
